@Chris-Aksel, re: "you can try it for 30days."

From what I understand is even if a loader or crack doesn't come out soon, you can still extend the 30 days again by using the command "slmgr.vbs /rearm" (without the quotes) in the command bar.  I've never used it so I don't know a) how long it will extend the system functionality, and b) how many times you can use it.  Anyone know?  Please tell us.

Until some activating bypass thingy comes along you could always just rearm

1. regedit HKLMSoftwareMicrosoftWindows NTCurrentVersionSoftwareProtectionPlatform and change the value for SkipRearm to 1
2. run "slmgr -rearm" (note! this will also reset the above mentined value to zero again)
3. Now the 30 day activating time is reset to 0 once more (You can only do this reset 7 times)

Everybody should now know that the server mentioned in the previous post is down. As of 02/09/2012, there are currently no kms servers to activate windows.

So for the sake of not annoying people, please do not post any "this is how i did it" posts until you can confirm that the server is back online, or a new server is known.
